CustomField.formula: IF( Note_Segmentation__c >0 && Note_Segmentation__c< 16, IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesSegmentation__c.FER__c, "FER", 39, 75), IF( Note_Segmentation__c >= 16 && Note_Segmentation__c < 30, IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesSegmentation__c.BRONZE__c, "BRONZE", 39, 75), IF( Note_Segmentation__c >= 30 && Note_Segmentation__c < 50, IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesSegmentation__c.ARGENT__c, "ARGENT", 39, 75), IF( Note_Segmentation__c >= 50, IMAGE($Setup.PictogrammesSegmentation__c.OR__c, "OR", 39, 75), NULL ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Score Segmentation
